Guanqun Yang

Master Student in UCLA ECE Department

The following is a list of courses I am taking or have taken at UCLA and Northeastern University, China.

UCLA Courses

Electrical and Computer Engineering Courses

  • ECE 146, Introduction to Machine Learning by Prof. Suhas Diggavi

  • ECE 205A, Matrix Analysis by Dr. Ameesh Pandya

  • ECE 214A, Digital Speech Processing by Prof. Abeer Alwan

  • ECE 219, Large-scale Data Mining: Models and Algorithms by Prof. Vwani P. Roychowdhury

  • ECE 230A, Detection and Estimation in Communication by Prof. Kung Yao

  • ECE 231A, Information Theory by Prof. Suhas Diggavi

  • ECE 232E, Large Scale Social and Complex Networks: Design and Algorithms by Prof. Vwani P. Roychowdhury

  • ECE 236A, Linear Programming by Prof. Christina Fragouli

  • ECE 236B, Convex Optimization by Prof. Lieven Vandenberghe

  • ECE 239AS, Special Topics in Signals and Systems: Neural Networks and Deep Learning by Prof. Jonathan Kao

Statistics Courses

  • STAT 202A, Statistical Programming by Prof. Ying Nian Wu

  • STAT 232C, Cognitive Artificial Intelligence by Prof. Tao Gao

Computer Science Courses

  • CS 260, Machine Learning Algorithms by Prof. Quanquan Gu

  • CS 269, Current Topics in Artificial Intelligence by Prof. Quanquan Gu

Northeastern University (China) Courses

Maths Courses

  • Univariate and Multivariate Calculus

  • Probability Theory and Mathematical Statistics

  • Linear Algebra (one of my favourite courses)

  • Complex Analysis and Integral Transform

  • Numerical Analysis

  • Mathematical Modeling (another fascinating course)

Computer Science Courses

  • Principle of Micro-Controllers

  • C Programming

  • Algorithm and Data Structures

  • Introduction to Evolutionary Computating

Signal and Circuits Courses

  • Principle of Circuits

  • Principle of Analog Circuits

  • Principle of Digital Circuits

  • Digital Signal Processing

  • Principle of Electric Machines and their Drives

Control Courses

  • Modern Control Theory

  • Process Control Theory

  • Programmable Logic Controllers and its Application
